# ARFrame.SegmentationClass.none

**Case**

A classification of a pixel in the segmentation buffer as unidentified.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Classifying Pixels

- **ARFrame.SegmentationClass.person**: A classification of a pixel in the segmentation buffer as part of a person.
